title: D.A.F.T.: A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes
original_title: D.A.F.T.: A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes
overview: Daft Punk's D.A.F.T. - A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes was released in 1999. It includes music videos for "Around the World", "Da Funk" and "Fresh", "Burnin'" and "Revolution 909".
synopsis: Daft Punk's D.A.F.T. - A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes was released in 1999. It includes music videos for "Around the World", "Da Funk" and "Fresh", "Burnin'" and "Revolution 909".
